home_description: ShopWise transforms your receipts into powerful insights, helping you save money, optimize your shopping list, and control your family's finances effortlessly.
powerful_features_description: Everything you need to manage your family's grocery spending.
feature_visual_insights_description: Analyze your spending with intuitive charts and make smarter decisions.
feature_camera_register_description: Register your purchases quickly by scanning the receipt's QR code.
feature_smart_lists_description: Receive AI-powered suggestions and never forget an item again.
feature_full_control_description: Manage your family, preferred stores, and analyze your purchase history.
login_description: Enter your credentials to access your account.
signup_description: Join thousands of families who are transforming their financial lives.
forgot_password_description: No problem. Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset it.
